name: Dino Game Remake
description:
Decided to make dino game by myself and remade original offline dino game in 3 days. It was fun to develop and good practice.

Controls

Avoid cactuses or birds by jumping. 

To jump, use either keys : Space, W or Up Arrow.

You can also use Mouse Left Click.

Press ESC key to bring menu.

Extra

 Double Speed: Play the game on double speed!

 AI: Do you think Dino AI can beat you? Give it a try! 

Sometimes a  bug feature happens, might or not get fixed. Credits

Bolt 2D DinoRun Assets Pack | 2D Characters | Unity Asset Store - Goldmetal DinoRun Asset

Pixel Art Bird 16x16 by ma9ici4n (itch.io) - ma9ici4n Pixel Art Bird

I edited and added some stuff by myself.
